name: mnglf
description:
play a full 18-hole course of minigolf in this micro sports game. created during week 3 of my "10 games in 10 weeks" challenge

career mode has you play all 18 holes in a row. go for the fastest time or lowest score. freeplay lets you practice individual holes and keeps track of your best times and scores.

click the ball and drag it to tee off. get it to the hole in as few strokes as possible.

in freeplay mode, press 'r' to restart the level.

gray menu box created by kenney :)

NOTE: i have noticed some performance issues for in-browser play on slower machines. i have included a windows executable as well that should run a little smoother, even on older hardware
